Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I must have done 20+ landings to try and get my "Ultimate Eve Lander" to live up to its name.

I can hyperedit into Eve's orbit fine, but seem to have to continually sit through a landing. A small ship works fine with the lander. But anything this big just instantly explodes if I try using the ship lander from orbit. Is there a trick to this?

yep

First 'land' to 50km height. Then set height to 5km. Click 'Land' twice. (The first click will release the physics again, the second click will lower your height to 5km). Set height to 500m (or 100 or 10, whatever). Click twice again. Sit back and see you lander slowly touch down on the surface.
